1.0.name: wordpress/fyrebox-shortcode
1.0.description:
The Fyrebox Shortcode plugin allows you to easily integrate a html5 game widget that you have built on Fyrebox.co into your Wordpress Blog by using a Wordpress shortcode. Use it like that in your blog post: [fyrebox gid=GAME_ID gt=GAME_TYPE /]. The shortcode for your game is located in the "publish" page of your page that you can access on the dashboard

Examples:

[fyrebox gid="i6WOeUCiUl" gt="8" /]

Embed the SoundCloud trivia shown on fyrebox.co

`[fyrebox gid="mlEZhG7KpF" gt="5" /]' Embed the word search puzzle shown on fyrebox.co
